1.title: Drew and Sam
1.plot: Drew and Sam's engagement is revealed.

2.title: The Key to My Apartment
2.plot: Danny is questioning Sam and Drew's relationship.

3.title: Stiring the Pot
3.plot: Danny begins telling fibs to get Sam to leave Drew alone.

4.title: Finding Motives
4.plot: Drew is figuring out why Sam is mysteriously acting strange.

5.title: Danny Has to Stop
5.plot: Floyd and Hattie begin to think that Danny is going to far.

6.title: Making a Marriage Work
6.plot: Drew fears that Sam has trust issues with her and is scared bout their uncertain future.

7.title: Drew the Big Sis
7.plot: Caroline feels pressured to have intercourse with her new boyfriend.

8.title: A Big Fuss Part 1
8.plot: Troy and Danny are invading Drew and Sam's privacy.

9.title: A Big Fuss Part 2
9.plot: Drew is fed up with Danny and Troy's behavior.

10.title: Ghost and Hattie
10.plot: Hattie thinks there may be a ghost in her house.

11.title: Sticking To The Basics
11.plot: Drew is trying to get Sam to stop acting strange.

12.title: Machine Operator
12.plot: A battered woman comes to the dinner trying to Avoid abusive partner.

13.title: Bored
13.plot: Troy begins getting bored of Danny.

14.title: Marshall
14.plot: Troy runs into an ex of hers which she has feelings for which leads to something dramatically shocking.

15.title: Off The Handle Part 1
15.plot: Danny is still upset about Sam and Drew's relationship.

16.title: Off The Handle Part 2
16.plot: Sam and Drew get into a huge argument .

17.title: In Regret
17.plot: Drew blames herself for Sam's hospitalization .

18.title: Doubt Can Hurt A Friendship
18.plot: Danny begins trying to win over Drew's love and affection.

19.title: Selfish
19.plot: Hattie is upset with Danny's behaviour.

20.title: Intervention
20.plot: The gang give Danny a intervention against Drew's wishes.

21.title: Teen Love
21.plot: Caroline begins rebelling against her father.

22.title: Drew and Caroline
22.plot: Caroline tries to get Drew to invite her girls over for a slumber party.

23.title: Out The Hospital
23.plot: Sam is out of the hospital and ask Drew to do the Unbelievable.

1.title: What's Love Got To Do With It?
1.plot: Hattie, owner of the Love Train Diner, has become fed-up with her grandson Danny leeching off of her. With his new college degree, he is able to successfully receive a position at his friends' Sam and Drew's workplace; Uncle Floyd discovers Linda's husband out with another woman.

2.title: Love Thy Independence
2.plot: After receiving word about her cheating husband, Linda goes into a depressed state and finds comfort staying at her mother's home.

3.title: Love Thy Privacy
3.plot: Sam learns that Linda has received a key from Danny to the "bachelor pad", and he demands that he get it back from her after she walks in on him while he is nude.

4.title: Love Ain't Opening This Door
4.plot: Linda leans on her son after her divorce; Sam feels Danny's clingy mother is visiting too much.

5.title: Where's My Mamma?
5.plot: Linda hopes to stay at Floyd's apartment after Hattie refuses to let her in; Hattie uses tough love to encourage Linda to fight for her life.

6.title: Love Thy Journey
6.plot: Linda starts working at the diner; the health inspector has a surprise visit; Linda and Floyd work to get the diner back up to code.

7.title: Love Thy Vindication
7.plot: A fire erupts at a diner and everyone thinks Hattie is responsible; a fire marshal determines the cause of the fire.

8.title: Love Thy Partnership
8.plot: business is slow at the diner, Hattie considers teaming up with Vivian.

9.title: Don't Mess with That White Lightning
9.plot: When Sam wakes up handcuffed to Hattie, he vows to stop partying.

10.title: Love Thy Celibacy
10.plot: Hattie misinterprets a conversation about celibacy; Danny believes that Linda as turned to prostitution.

11.title: The Black Tie Affair
11.plot: Marty invites Linda to the Mayor's Ball; Danny gets Floyd and Sam to help him scare Marty away.

12.title: Love Thy Compromise
12.plot: Danny withholds his half of the rent.

13.title: Love That Bracelet
13.plot: Sam stops partying, but continues to sleep around; Danny and Drew play a trick on Sam.

14.title: Love Thy Boss
14.plot: The new boss starts at Beagal and Steve; Drew invites Marianna to move into the extra room in her apartment.

15.title: Love Thy Doctor
15.plot: After her annual physical, Hattie is convinced she is dying; Vivian's horse is sick.

16.title: Love Thy Baby
16.plot: Hattie finds an abandoned baby in the diner bathroom.

17.title: Love Thy Patient
17.plot: When Hattie falls while working late at the diner, she pretends to be hurt to garner sympathy and help.

18.title: Love That Surprise
18.plot: When Linda throws Hattie a surprise birthday party, Hattie fires shots.

19.title: My First Love
19.plot: Linda runs into her high school sweetheart, and then questions her existence.

20.title: Love Thy Wager
20.plot: Danny bets Sam he cannot stay in the apartment for an entire weekend.

21.title: Love Thy Mortality
21.plot: After attending a funeral, Sam decides to turn over a new leaf.

22.title: Love Thy Self
22.plot: Drew does not want Marianna around, believing she could be stealing potential dates.

23.title: Love Thy Youth
23.plot: Rather than hanging out with his mother, Danny is urged to spend time with people his own age.

24.title: Love Thy Children
24.plot: Danny and Sam mentor ''at risk'' youths; Floyd is robbed at the restaurant.

25.title: Love Thy Courage
25.plot: After being accused of infidelity, Danny fears for his safety.

26.title: Love Thy Family
26.plot: The family gathers at Hattie's during a storm.

0.title: Episode #2.0
0.plot:

1.title: Take Your Pick
1.plot: Hattie and Drew make Linda an online dating profile.

2.title: The Internet Suitor
2.plot: Linda meets a man she met online.

3.title: The Predator
3.plot: There's bad news about Linda's new boyfriend.

4.title: An Unfortunate Circumstance
4.plot: Will ends up not being as bad as everyone thought.

5.title: Duped
5.plot: Linda looks for a new apartment; Will helps.

6.title: Duped - Part 2
6.plot: Linda is dismissive when the others tell her that Will has tricked her.

7.title: Linda to the Rescue
7.plot: Linda helps a young woman grow up.

8.title: Fair to Middlin
8.plot: Hattie helps a heartbroken Linda by pushing her to go to work.

9.title: Missed Calls
9.plot: When Will visits at the diner, Linda confronts him after she's been scammed out of $3,000.

10.title: Danny Meets Philip
10.plot: Linda makes plans with Philip and Will, but she cancels her plans with Philip.

11.title: Permission Granted
11.plot: Philip goes to Danny and asks if he can date his mother.

12.title: I Don't See You That Way
12.plot: Philip treats Linda to a romantic dinner.

13.title: The Kiss
13.plot: Phillip admits his feelings for Linda and the two share a romantic kiss with each other.

15.title: Love Thy Condiments
15.plot: Linda looks for a new apartment; Will helps.

16.title: Will and Philip
16.plot: Philip's playing cards with the group; Linda's surprised when Will also shows up at the house.

17.title: Love Thy Competition
17.plot: Linda and Phillip are caught with their tongues tied; Will breaks up with Linda.

18.title: A Tornado Named Linda
18.plot: Hattie helps a heartbroken Linda by pushing her to go to work.

19.title: Lucky Socks
19.plot: Danny, Floyd, Sam, and Drew have been temporarily evicted; Danny asks Hattie if they can crash with her.

20.title: The Make-Up
20.plot: Philip moves on.; Will apologizes to Linda.

21.title: Gotcha - Part 1
21.plot: Danny thinks that he already knows a potential client and that she is the same woman that tricked his mother out of $3,000.

22.title: Gotcha - Part 2
22.plot: After realizing that Will duped her, Linda is heartbroken.

23.title: Make Love to Me
23.plot: Linda goes back to Philip and indulges in a spontaneous night of passion.

24.title: A Night Away
24.plot: Linda's inhibitions return upon her waking; she is shocked and upset when she realizes she's in Philip's bed.

25.title: Did Philip Get Away
25.plot: Philip is in a new relationship; Linda has just found out which raises her suspicions.

26.title: Morning Sickness
26.plot: Linda finds out she is pregnant with Phillip being the father.

1.title: Sarah
1.plot: Upon a visit to the Love Train Diner, Sarah exposes her relationship with Philip.

2.title: Linda's Hormones
2.plot: In the midst of experiencing pregnancy hormones, Linda decides to tell Phillip about the baby.

3.title: Madea's Pressure Is Up
3.plot: With Madea's help, Hattie confronts Phillip; the subject is Linda's pregnancy.

4.title: Madea & Hattie
4.plot: Made'a and Hattie attempt to hurt Philip.

5.title: When She Was a Little Girl
5.plot: In an effort to make Philip feel guilty, Hattie shows him a letter Linda wrote when she was younger.

6.title: Linda's Silence
6.plot: In a sudden change of heart, Philip has decided he wants to marry Linda; he tells Danny and Hattie.

7.title: Don't Feel Pressured
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: The Ring - Part 1
8.plot: Philip panics when the engagement ring is missing; Floyd, Sam and Danny try to help him find it.

9.title: The Ring - Part 2
9.plot: Philip doubts himself; Hattie convinces him to start over and give Linda the ring.

10.title: Just the Way You Are
10.plot: Hattie throws a surprise party for Linda to make her feel more appreciated by everyone.

11.title: Love for Linda
11.plot: Linda's son Danny tries to plan his mom a surprise baby shower. But Philip has other plans to surprise Linda and asks her to marry him by singing and playing the piano.

12.title: Ella And Curtis
12.plot: Linda ask Ella Payne to help plan her wedding. Meanwhile, Curtis Payne wants Floyd to pay him back for his investment in the diner.

13.title: Drew's Feelings
13.plot: Drew reveals her love for Danny.

14.title: Caroline and P.J.
14.plot: Linda has to tell P.J. and Caroline that she's engaged to their father.

15.title: Ronald and Maggie
15.plot: Linda meets Phillip's ex in-laws; her family comes along.

16.title: Spring Cleaning
16.plot: Hattie prepares for spring cleaning at the diner; Linda explains why she can't move in with Phillip.

17.title: An Empty Palate
17.plot: Linda threatens to call the wedding off if Philip does not change the furniture in his house.

18.title: Love Thy Decorator
18.plot: Philip allows Linda to redecorate the house in whatever way she chooses.

19.title: The Promotion
19.plot: After Hattie finds out that Danny got a promotion, she asks him to help pay for Linda's wedding.

20.title: I Got You Baby
20.plot: Linda asks Hattie if she'll stay and help her when the baby comes, because she doubts that Philip will help with the newborn.

21.title: Troy
21.plot: Danny shows Drew's cousin around for the weekend,and falls for her fast.

22.title: Vegas
22.plot: Troy and Danny inevitably do something stupid in Las Vegas. In the last minute Linda's water breaks while she is 6 months pregnant.

1.title: A Mother's Heartbreak
1.plot: Heartbroken, Linda has to put up with Danny's impulsive decisions.

2.title: Three Is a Crowd
2.plot: Troy and Sam zero in on Danny.

3.title: Enough of This
3.plot: Danny has to deal with how his friends and family feel about his wife.

4.title: A Pregnant Wife
4.plot: Philip learns the basics of pregnancy.

5.title: One Mama of a Nightmare
5.plot: Danny struggles with his mother's absence.

6.title: Hattie Still Got It
6.plot: Hattie tries to force Linda and Troy to discuss their differences.

7.title: Danny's Wife
7.plot: Sam has a horrible time accepting Danny's responsibility as Troy's husband.

8.title: A Fresh Bath
8.plot: Sam pushes Danny over the edge and causes him to make a dramatic change in his life.

9.title: Hattie's Uncle
9.plot: Hattie has to once again face the consequences of not paying taxes.

10.title: Why Hattie's Happy
10.plot: Linda finds out why Hattie's been uncommonly happy.

11.title: Second Thoughts
11.plot: Troy discusses her marriage troubles with Hattie.

12.title: The Bus Station
12.plot: Thanks to Drew, there's a misunderstanding.

13.title: Invasion of Privacy
13.plot: Sam violates Troy's personal space and continues to disrupt Danny's marriage.

14.title: Who You Know
14.plot: Everyone joins in for a game of "Who You Know".

15.title: Vernon
15.plot: An evening of passion takes a twisted turn; Hattie fears for her friend's life.

16.title: D-Day
16.plot: Sam makes a risky decision that puts him in a tough situation.

17.title: Scared
17.plot: Sam is compelled to reveal the true nature surrounding his lack of maturity.

18.title: Hattie's Memoirs
18.plot: Hattie's decision to write memoirs causes unrest among her family and friends.

19.title: I Want My Mamma
19.plot: Linda reaches a point where the only one that can come to the rescue is her mother.

20.title: Crying Wolf
20.plot: Linda receives a surprising phone call.

21.title: Tired
21.plot: A heated discussion with Danny's family brings Troy to her limit.

22.title: Done
22.plot: Danny can't take anymore of Sam's annoying behavior.

1.title: Locked Out
1.plot: In the fifth and final season opener, Linda worries about Danny isolating himself in his apartment.

2.title: Wine with Cereal
2.plot: Danny goes into a funk after troy leaves him.

3.title: No Respect for Danny
3.plot: Danny is angry with his family and friends because of how they have treated Troy.

4.title: Digging the Hole Deeper
4.plot: Linda continues to exhibit her dislike for Troy as symptoms from her pregnancy worsen.

5.title: Unanswered
5.plot: Danny's family tries to reach him during an emergency.

6.title: She's Pretty
6.plot: Linda is in labor at the diner.

7.title: Better Late Than Never
7.plot: A missed call leaves Danny and his family in a bad place.

8.title: Make Up or Make Out
8.plot: Still upset with his friends, Danny takes the advice of his family.

9.title: Last Night
9.plot: Sam and Drew wake up in a precarious position.

10.title: The Cure for Sweat
10.plot: Danny's cure for sweat causes Troy to suspect Danny is cheating.

12.title: My Two Favorite Girls
12.plot: Linda apologizes to Danny and Troy.

13.title: When a Father Sleeps
13.plot: Linda lets Philip take care of the baby alone.

14.title: Father Knows Best
14.plot: Trying to teach Philip a lesson, Linda leaves Philip alone with their new baby.

15.title: A Sweaty Proposition
15.plot: Troy and Danny deal with a personal hygiene problem in their marriage.

16.title: It's Just Dinner
16.plot: Sam's confidence becomes shaken after he prepares dinner for Drew and she declines.

17.title: Catching Sam
17.plot: Sam and Drew's secret gets revealed.

18.title: Number Five Sixty-Seven
18.plot: Danny confronts Sam and Drew about their relationship.

19.title: The Same Old Sam
19.plot: Convinced that he's in love with Drew, Sam does the unthinkable.

20.title: Candles and Flowers
20.plot: Sam's poorly misguided plan to win Drew's affection backfires.

21.title: One Day Soon
21.plot: Hattie Drew and Troy decide to babysit Baby Celina.

22.title: True Feelings
22.plot: Sam and Drew discuss their feelings for one another.

imdb.title: Love Thy Neighbor
plot: From Tyler Perry's plays, gun-toting Grandma Hattie has been given her own sitcom. Managing the Love Train Diner with her brother-in-law Floyd, she dishes out justice in the best way: with love.
